english.segment1: In life's troubles, sorrow's pain. Earnestly I seek Thee. Fill my soul with peace again. Earnestly I seek Thee
english.segment2: None but You, and You alone. Take my life, make it Your own. In my off'ring, build Your home. Earnestly I seek Thee
english.segment3: In life's trial of victories. Earnestly I seek Thee. In the shadow of the Almighty. Earnestly I seek Thee
english.segment4: None but You, and You alone. Take my life, make it Your own. In my off'ring, build Your home. Earnestly I seek Thee
english.segment5: I sing to You, 'cause You're good. And Your love is bigger than life. I will live to bring You praise. I will bless You always
english.segment6: Who am I that You would care?. Earnestly I seek Thee. All my days, my nights, You're there. Earnestly I seek Thee
english.segment7: None but You, and You alone. Take my life, make it Your own. In my off'ring, build Your home. Earnestly I seek Thee. Earnestly I seek Thee
english.segment8: None but You, and You alone. Take my life, make it Your own. In my off'ring, build Your home. Earnestly I seek Thee
